file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-18-06-05 - SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR ACTUATING AND LOCKING MECHANISM - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR ACTUATING AND LOCKING MECHANISM - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the functional check of the actuating, latching, and locking mechanism of the side-hinged main door. B. These procedures are applicable to the locking and unlocking simulations of the side-hinged main door with the internal and external handles. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR ACTUATING AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE- 52-18-06-700-801-A ♦ LATCHING AND LOCKING MECHANISM- HINGED MAIN DOOR FUNCTIONAL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-18-06 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-18-06-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 2. SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR ACTUATING LATCHING AND LOCKING MECHANISM- FUNCTIONAL CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the functional check of the actuating, latching, and locking mechanism of the side-hinged main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION MAIN-DOOR INTERCONNECTING RODS - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-802-A/500 MENT AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-803-A/500 MAIN-DOOR LOCKING-MECHANISM CAMS - TEST AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-804-A/500 MAIN DOOR CABLES - ADJUSTMENT AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-805-A/500 MAIN DOOR ROLLERS - ADJUSTMENT MAIN DOOR-TO-FUSELAGE SKIN GAP - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-806-A/500 MENT MAIN DOOR-TO-FUSELAGE SKIN STEP - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-807-A/500 MENT AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-808-A/500 MAIN DOOR STOPS - ADJUSTMENT AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-810-A/500 MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - ADJUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Functional Check of Side-Hinged Main Door Actuating, Latching, and Locking Mechanism SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do a functional check of the actuating, latching, and locking mechanism of the side- hinged main door as follows: (a) Adjust the main-door interconnecting rods (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-802-A/ 500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 52-18-06 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Adjust the main-door locking-mechanism cams (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-803-A/ 500). (c) Adjust the main door cables (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-804-A/500). (d) Adjust the main door rollers (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-805-A/500). (e) Adjust the main door-to-fuselage skin gap (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-806-A/500). (f) Adjust the main door-to-fuselage skin step (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-807-A/ 500). (g) Adjust the main door stops (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-808-A/500). (h) Adjust the main-door folding flap (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-810-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 52-18-06 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
